product_details.name: Farmley Premium Tropical Savoury Mix - A Perfect Blend of Nuts & Dried Fruits
product_details.description:
• Premium blend of nuts and dried fruits for a wholesome snacking experience
• Contains nutritious mix of almonds, cashews, cranberries, blueberries, and black raisins
• Perfectly balanced sweet and savory tropical flavors
• Includes exotic ingredients like mango and papaya for unique taste
• 100% natural ingredients with no artificial additives
• Convenient resealable packaging to maintain freshness
• Rich in essential nutrients and healthy antioxidants
• Perfect for on-the-go snacking or party servings
• Vegetarian-friendly product (Green dot certified)
• Ideal balance of proteins, healthy fats, and natural sugars

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and vibrant design centered around a snack product. A rich navy blue background, enhanced with soft circular and wavy abstract shapes, sets a modern and dynamic visual tone. The banner prominently displays the product image ("product_image") in the center, surrounded by various compelling text elements. The top features an eye-catching headline ("heading") in bold white, followed by a bright yellow subheading ("subheading") beneath it. At the bottom, a white tagline ("tagline") supports a large yellow discount text ("price"), emphasizing the offer. A green call-to-action button ("cta_button") with white text ("cta") invites users to make a purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#283b53`
- Olive Yellow: `#ffce44`
- Light Periwinkle: `#a3afef`
- Fresh Green: `#008a00`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image employs a vibrant and appetizing color palette that effectively draws attention while emphasizing freshness and tropical flavor. The dominant colors include a warm mustard yellow (Hex: #F5AA3D) for the background, conveying warmth and energy, and a deep navy blue (Hex: #1C3E7C) for the branding and text, providing contrast and elegance. The snack mix includes lively accents such as cranberry red (Hex: #A8323E), mango yellow (Hex: #FFC107), creamy cashew white (Hex: #F5E8D7), and almond brown (Hex: #8B5B2B). These hues are strategically blended yet individually highlighted to showcase product diversity and natural appeal—ideal for an energetic promotional banner.
